comprehensive overview: C++ is a high-level programming language developed by Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language. It is known for its efficiency, flexibility, and performance, making it widely used in developing system software, game engines, desktop applications, and more.
core features: Strongly typed language, allows object-oriented programming, supports generic programming through templates, provides low-level memory manipulation, offers standard template library (STL) for data structures and algorithms
